description.value: Your training regimen has given you particular advantages when it comes to enforcing the interests of your faith. You gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against primal spells and effects that deal elemental damage. You can use Society to [[/act coerce statistic=religion]]{Coerce}, [[/act gather-information statistic=religion]]{Gather Information}, or [[/act track statistic=religion]]{Track} as long as you are in a town or city, extracting clues by subtly manipulating people using your knowledge of society and it's workings.
